ACCEPTED_1.message: Excellent. I'll load the goods on your ship.

ACCEPTED_3.message: Ok, good. I hope I can trust you.

ACCEPTED_PICKUP_1.message: Ok, I will take care that the goods are ready for collection.

ACCEPTED_PICKUP_2.message: It's a deal! I will contact my colleagues that you are on your way.

ADTEXT_1.message: CARGO RUN. Delivery of cargo to the {system} system.

ADTEXT_2.message: NEED TRANSPORTATION. Transport of goods to the {system} system needed. Pay {cash}.

ADTEXT__6.message: DELIVERY. Valuable Cargo to the {system} system. {cash} to an experienced pilot.

ADTEXT_LOCAL_1.message: LOCAL DELIVERY. Move of goods to {starport}.

ADTEXT_LOCAL_2.message: TRANSPORT NEEDED. Delivery of local cargo to {starport}.

ADTEXT_LOCAL_3.message: LOCAL CARGO RUN. Delivery of goods to {starport}.

ADTEXT_WHOLESALER.message: CARGO SERVICE. We require a ship for a delivery to {system} system.

ADTEXT_PICKUP.message: CARGO PICKUP. Pickup of cargo from the {system} system required.

COULD_YOU_REPEAT_THE_ORIGINAL_REQUEST.message: Could you repeat the original request?

INTROTEXT_1.message: Hi, I'm {name}. I'll pay you {cash} if you will deliver {cargoname} to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

INTROTEXT_2.message: Greetings. {name} Transport Services needs you to deliver {cargoname} to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, {dist} ly away. We pay {cash} for a save and complete delivery.

INTROTEXT_3.message: Good day. I'm {name} founder of the {name} Ltd. I need someone trusworthy to deliver {cargoname} to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. I pay {cash} for the {dist} ly long flight.

INTROTEXT__2.message: Hello. The {name} Mining Company wants to deliver {cargoname} to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, {dist} ly away, to build a new mine. The pay is {cash}.

INTROTEXT__4.message: Greetings. I'm {name}. The {system} government wants to deliver {cargoname} to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. Where they want to build a new district. The pay is {cash}. {system} is {dist} ly from here.

INTROTEXT__6.message: Hello. This could be a dangerous run. We need someone experienced for a run to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. We pay {cash}. The distance is {dist} ly.

INTROTEXT__7__1.message: Hi, my name is {name}. I want to carry {cargoname} to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. You know, the little fluffy creatures, which no human can resist. The distance is {dist} ly. I pay {cash} for this delivery.

INTROTEXT__7__2.message: Greetings. Have you heard of the wedding season of {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system? We want to transport {cargoname} there. It's {dist} ly away. The pay is {cash} credits. How about it?

INTROTEXT_LOCAL_1.message: Nice to meet you. I'm {name} and I work for the {starport} administration. We pay {cash} to someone who is able to move {cargoname} to {starport}.

INTROTEXT_LOCAL_2.message: Hi. I'm {name} and I will pay {cash} for a delivery of {cargoname} to {starport}.

INTROTEXT_LOCAL_3.message: My name is {name} and I need {cargoname} delivered to a client at {starport}. I'll pay you {cash} credits for this run.

INTROTEXT_WHOLESALER_1.message: Hello, my name is {name} and I'm wholesale dealer in the {system} system. I pay {cash} for the run to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

INTROTEXT_WHOLESALER_2.message: Greetings, my name is {name} and I work for Haber Corp. We pay {cash} for the run to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

INTROTEXT_PICKUP_1.message: How do you do? My name is {name}. I need a ship that is able to fly to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, pickup {cargoname} and return to {dom_starport} in the {dom_system} ({dom_sectorx}, {dom_sectory}, {dom_sectorz}) system for {cash} credits. The distance to {system} is {dist} ly.

INTROTEXT_PICKUP_2.message: How are you? I'm {name}. One of my clients wants to import {cargoname} from the {dist} ly away {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. He pays {cash} credits for this cargo run. Return here to {dom_starport} in the {dom_system} ({dom_sectorx}, {dom_sectory}, {dom_sectorz}) system to unload the cargo.

DENY_1.message: I'm sorry, but this cargo is too valuable for me to hand them over to an inexperienced pilot.

DENY_2.message: Who are you? I do not know you and I do not trust you.

DENY_3.message: I'm sorry, I'm looking for an experienced pilot.

DENY_4.message: Excuse me, but I do not think that you can get the job done.

DENY_5.message: Don't waste my time! You are too wet behind the ears.

DENY_6.message: You're kidding, right? Come back when you're more experienced!

FAILUREMSG_1.message: I'm very disappointed by the late delivery. You will not be paid.

FAILUREMSG_2.message: What should I do with these things? You are too late! The goods are now worthless!

FAILUREMSG_3.message: Listen, we were clear about the deadline. I refuse you to pay.

FAILUREMSG_4.message: I'll make a note of your vessel identification number. From now on, I will reject all requests for work from you.

FAILUREMSG__7__1.message: You bastard, you have waited too long for this delivery. All my fluffy pets are starved!

WHAT_IS_THIS.message: What's this? You have jettisoned my cargo? Are you crazy?

I_HAVE_DEBITED_YOUR_ACCOUNT.message: I've debited your account with the missing goods.

HOW_SOON_MUST_IT_BE_DELIVERED.message: How soon must it be delivered?

URGENCY_1.message: There is no rush. It must be delivered by

URGENCY_2.message: It must necessarily be delivered by

URGENCY_3.message: Because of the close schedule it must be delivered by

URGENCY_4.message: We are in hurry. So it must be delivered by

URGENCY_5.message: It is essential that the goods have been delivered before

URGENCY__3__5.message: The cargo consists of neptunium-235. So the delivery must be completed until

URGENCY__7__1.message: Because of the reproduction rate of the little pets and the limited food in the container, the delivery must be completed until

WILL_I_BE_IN_ANY_DANGER.message: Will I be in any danger?

RISK_3.message: This is valuable cargo, you should keep your eyes open.

RISK_4.message: It could be dangerous, you should make sure you're adequately prepared.

RISK_5.message: This is very risky, you will almost certainly run into resistance.

RISK_6.message: I personally think, you'll never reach your destination.

RISK__6.message: We have done everything to keep the delivery secret. But we can never have certainty.

RISK__6__1.message: The goods are very sought after by art lovers.

RISK__6__2.message: It is possible that an unscrupulous jewel trader wants to intercept the cargo.

RISK_WHOLESALER.message: The police have promised us to patrol the area.

SUCCESSMSG_1.message: Thank you for the transportation of our goods. You have been paid.

SUCCESSMSG_2.message: Thanks for the timely delivery. The money was transferred.

SUCCESSMSG_3.message: Excellent, it's a pleasure to work with you. I have paid the bill.

SUCCESSMSG_4.message: Fine, I will definitely recommend you. Here's your money.

SUCCESSMSG__7__1.message: Oh dear, I wished you had my cargo jettisoned. Anyway, here is your payment.

WHYSOMUCHTEXT_2.message: Accept it, or leave it be.

WHYSOMUCHTEXT_3.message: Is it a lot? I don't think so.

WHYSOMUCHTEXT_4.message: I wish that the goods will be delivered on time and in one piece.

WHYSOMUCHTEXT_5.message: I wish that you remain silent about the delivery.

WHYSOMUCHTEXT_6.message: Well, we would be happy to pay you less.

WHYSOMUCHTEXT_URGENT_1.message: My favorite pilot is sick and time is short.

WHYSOMUCHTEXT_URGENT_2.message: If we do not meet the delivery date, we have to pay penalty.

WHYSOMUCHTEXT_EXPENSIVE_1.message: The valuable goods are in great demand.

WHYSOMUCHTEXT__1.message: These goods are needed urgently in a chemical plant. A delivery date is at risk.

WHYSOMUCHTEXT__2.message: These goods are essential for the construction of a new mine.

WHYSOMUCHTEXT__4.message: These goods are important to a construction stage. They can't proceed without this products.

WHYSOMUCHTEXT__6.message: The police informed us that an unknown group of pirates attacked cargo ships in this system.

WHYSOMUCHTEXT__7__1.message: Quibbles are the fast seller this season. You should invest in Quibble shares if you want to make a lot of money.

WHYSOMUCHTEXT__7__2.message: So far I could not find anyone to perform this transport. When the season is over, my merchandise is worthless.

PIRATE_TAUNTS_1.message: This will be your last run!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_2.message: You work for {client}? This is your end!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_3.message: Hey buddy, fork over the goods. Now!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_4.message: Pal, you'll never reach your destination.

PIRATE_TAUNTS_5.message: Ah, another fat goose enroute to {location}.

PIRATE_TAUNTS_6.message: Hey Dude, this task is too big for you! I'll take over!

PIRATE_GRIPES_1.message: Damn! You will pay for this.

ESCORT_CHATTER_1.message: Oh no. Hostile craft detected. Let us attack it together.

ESCORT_CHATTER_2.message: Great. This pirate will be my first kill.

ESCORT_CHATTER_3.message: Enemy spotted. Begin with the attack.

ESCORT_CHATTER_4.message: Proceed to your destination. I'll cover.

ESCORT_CHATTER_5.message: Tally ho. This will be my first catch today.

ESCORT_HABER_GREETING.message: Feel happy. Haber Corp. protects its business partners.

CEASE_FIRE.message: Cease fire, cease fire. I'm on your side.

I_AM_ON_MY_WAY.message: Sensors show that you are taking damage. I'm on my way.

YOU_DO_NOT_HAVE_ENOUGH_CARGO_SPACE_ON_YO.message: You do not have enough cargo space on your ship.

WE_HAVE_LOADED_UP_THE_CARGO_ON_YOUR_SHIP.message: We have loaded up the cargo on your ship.
